content: sts repeat 48 sts round 9 2 double_crochet sts in the first st 1 half_double_crochet in the next 7 sts = 9 sts repeat 54 sts blo round 10 2 double_crochet sts in the first st 1 half_double_crochet in the next 8 sts = 10 sts repeat 60 sts side note you may want to perform a swatch test here to check your gauge the basic circle at this point should measure approximately 4 inches wide depending on gauge if your gauge is too loose however you may want to tighten your stitches in order to prevent stuffing from spilling through your finished project tip you can use panty hose to line the inside of your project and help hold stuffing in place to prevent spillage round 11 1 half_double_crochet st in each st around 60 sts blo round 12 1 half_double_crochet in the first st 1 double_crochet in the second st 1 treble_crochet in the third st 1 double_crochet in the fourth st 1 half_double_crochet in the fifth st repeat 60 sts round 13 1 half_double_crochet st in each st around 60 sts blo round 14 1 half_double_crochet in the first st 1 double_crochet in the second st 1 treble_crochet in the third st 1 double_crochet in the fourth st 1 half_double_crochet in the fifth st repeat 60 sts round 15 1 half_double_crochet st in each st around 60 sts blo round 16 1 half_double_crochet in the first st 1 double_crochet in the second st 1 treble_crochet in the third st 1 double_crochet in the fourth st 1 half_double_crochet in the fifth st repeat 60 sts round 17 1 half_double_crochet st in each st around 60 sts blo round 18 1 half_double_crochet in the first st 1 double_crochet in the second st 1 treble_crochet in the third st 1 double_crochet in the fourth st 1 half_double_crochet in the fifth st repeat 60 sts round 19 1 half_double_crochet st in each st around 60 sts blo *start adding stuffing tip if you break up the poly-fil stuffing into smaller pieces it will prevent it from bunching up decreases *how to create a decrease using double cross crochet yarn over insert hook into the next stitch pull yarn through you will have 3 loops on your hook pull yarn through the first two loops you will now have 2 loops on your hook yarn over insert hook into the next stitch pull yarn through you will now have 4 loops on your hook pull yarn through the first two loops you will now have 3 loops on your hook pull yarn through all 3 loops round 20 1 half_double_crochet in the first 8 sts 2 double_crochet decrease in the next st = 9 sts repeat 54 sts round 21 1 half_double_crochet st in each st around 54 sts blo round 22 1 double_crochet in the first 2 sts 1 half_double_crochet in the next 2 sts = 4 sts repeat = 52 sts 1 double_crochet in the next 2 sts 54 sts
